title.rendered: NEWTECONS SET A REVENUE TARGET OF 10,000 BILLION IN 2022

content.rendered:
[February 8, 2022, Ho Chi Minh City] At the signing ceremony of Business Plan, Newtecons ushers in the Year of the Tiger with the goal of achieving 10,000 billion VND in revenue by 2022. The Board of Directors and all levels of management were present for the signing ceremony.

Newtecons has overcome a series of challenges caused by the pandemic, a lack of materials, equipment, and workers, and now has a revenue of 5,363 billion in 2021, making it one of the few leading construction enterprises with strong revenue growth compared to 2020. In the face of a tumultuous market, this is a tremendous effort by a cohesive team, from the Board of Directors to the company’s employees.

On January 21, at the ceremony of the 2022 production and business plan, the Newtecons Executive Board and the Heads of Departments/Divisions/Units sat down to discuss, present in detail and thoroughly the upcoming business plan. Each goal has gotten a lot of feedback, and comment, as well as the finest implementation solutions.

Newtecons aims to increase both revenue and profit in 2022. In addition, Newtecons has determined that the most essential goal is to complete its structure, stay up with market trends, raise staff levels, and bring projects to completion with the quality guaranteed by the Newtecons brand and its powerful human resources.

Mr. Tran Kim Long – General Director of Newtecons shared: “With positive results in 2021 and the unanimity and dedication of a “strong Tiger” team, Newtecons will grow dramatically in 2022, we confidently achieve the set plan, bring a prosperous year to Newtecons people.”

Based on the market’s scenario and an experienced team that has always overcome all obstacles and difficulties to break through limits, find new solutions, and effective ways to complete our projects, Newtecons’ Board of Directors has set three goals, the most optimistic of which is revenue of 10,000 billion in 2022, an increase of approximately 87% over 2021. By improving the structure and team to adapt to the new position that helps Newtecons combine a set of stages from Procurement – Design – Engineering – Cost Management – Equipment – Construction & Human Force, etc… from the Office to the Construction Division to save costs, optimize quality, control the system, ensure safety, improve labor rate, and perfect services.

In the signing ceremony, the key management team of the Company, representing all employees, committed to the Board of Directors to excellently implement the goals and action plan in 2022.

Newtecons will develop even stronger in 2022 and the following years, maintaining its position as the leading Construction General Contractor in Vietnam, believing that with strong internal resources, consensus, and dedication, this goal will be quickly achieved and beyond expectations.

Let’s take a look back at some of Newtecons most thrilling new year images to start a fantastic year of the Tiger:
